caption: This was my husband and I first time going to taste of Heaven the staff was friendly and professional but best of all the food is delicious well seasoned and not with salt thank you we will be definitely coming back again thank you Taste Of Heaven Restaurant I pray that you open the chain in bed sty Brooklyn peace love and light

I went to Taste of Heaven for the 1st time last week and the food was just as amazing as the staff/owners! I came all the way to Brooklyn from Eastern Connecticut to try them and they didn't disappoint. Everyone was friendly and extremely helpful. I would return simply based off of the hospitality even if the food was just ok, but the food delicious!!! I tried all 3 flavors of their turkey wings and their chicken and shrimp and everything was seasoned perfectly. This is the best soul food I've had since leaving the south! I will definitely be making that trip again! Well worth it!
Amazing food with really sweet owners, and really good prices! Got the small dinner with jerk chicken, mac and cheese, and collard greens — everything was great. Can’t wait to go back!
Excellent service! Highly recommended!!
Good fpod
I love the friendly atmosphere of this place and I love every item on the menu, their food is so delecious
Good soul food
Really really really good. Best yams I've had.
Excellent, excellent and more excellent!! From the food to the owners!! The jerk chicken, cabbage and rice/peas -- mouth watering. Every time! Don't miss out on this GEM of a restaurant!
The food here is incredible and the owners are some of the nicest people I've ever met.
Tony is the MAN.!!
I love this food & the owners. Their food is always fresh, delicious & plentiful! God bless & keep them successful. Always a wonderful dining experience!
Absolutely excellent soul food. The ribs and Mac and cheese are the truth. Reasonably priced and amazing food! Local staple

The name of the restaurant stands true to the quality of the food! Lots of options, great flavors, and the food here is fairly priced. The food is seasoned well and will fill you with joy! Portions are great and the staff is very kind.
This place is a small eating establishment but the food is delicious ... One of the best soul food places in the east
Great food I recommend

Heavens is delicious and fresh - so good that if you arrive too late on a Saturday they might be out of food!!  Friendly and hilarious staff :) Challenged the head chef’s buddy to a chess game on the house board. We put my chicken dinner money on the game and I won :))  Went home and ate some of the best soul food I’ve had in a while!!
The best food ever!!!!!!!!!!!

Just thinking about it is making me hungry. I have a lot of favorites in Williamsburg and Brooklyn Tony and Melanie‘s food it’s on my tops.  I love the Jerk chicken dinner with yams and the green beans.  No this chicken is not that dry stuff you get everywhere.  This stuff is delicious made slow and falls right  off the bone.  The sides are delicious too, and don’t forget the cornbread.  Thank you Melanie and Tony For satisfying this Old foodies  passion for quality food done right
Good ol’down home cooking The food was delicious, definitely try the ribs
Good food not enough portions for the price
Food was great, Had the jerked chicken with rice and Mac and cheese. So good!!! rice was moist and tasty. Highly  recommend!
Good food!

My uncle and his lovely wife Mel  are  amazing cooks and they pour lots of love into their food just as they do In their welcoming home when you visit. Fantastic family with authentic soul food just like my grandmas kitchen back in the day!

Had the chicken dinner with mac and cheese and seasoned rice tonight, and it was excellent!! The chicken was so flavorful, and not at all dry. The rice was well seasoned on it's own, but the chicken gave it even more flavor. I look forward to trying more dishes! Highly recommend!!
The best soul food in New York City.
Great food, great service, great prices.  Definitely worth a trip.  Went with the oxtail dinner (yams and mac n cheese) and it certainly lived up to my lofty expectations.
Can't get enough of my man sweet and mel bake mac and cheese fried chicken yams I forward to see you soon
Food was absolutely delicious 😋. Great customer service.
super good food
The food and service are amazing, clean, and organized.
Best in Brooklyn
The food was incredible! Not everyone can cook soulfood as good as they think they can. I totally understand why they are so highly rated on Yelp. Thanks Mel & Tony you will see me again!
Nice variety of foods from which to choose. Nice size portions as well. You will not be disappointed.
Delicious and so cheap! Mel is really nice, and the food is amazing! I’ll definitely be stopping by often. They also accept cashless payments, super helpful!

This spot is a 💎! I tried the jerk chicken, Mac and cheese, yams, rice and peas all delish! A wife and husband team offering home cooked comfort food. If you frequent here, you will definitely make a connection with the proprietors, always warm and welcoming ♥
The mac & cheese 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍 The Rosemary chicken 👌👌👌👌👌👌 The rice 😋😋😋😋😋😋😋 Everything 5 stars
Amazing just amazing oh yeah this guy will be back often
Love going I get to see James because he is on point all the time and my favorite waiter.
(Translated by Google) The food is very rich, I recommend everyone to visit it, they will not regret  (Original) Muy rica la comida ,yo recomiendo a todos que lo visiten no se van a lamentar

Wow. I had it for the first time last week and honestly one of the best Jerk Chicken meals I've had before. I am sure their other food is made with just as much love and will definitely be going back to try more! And to add the icing on the cake owners not just only cook good food but spread love. Like their sign says walk in a stranger, leave a friend :) definitely need to try in you're in the area!

Despite not being able to dine in this wonderful lil'spot, due to the covid 19, this place is Blessed with a Beautiful staff & truly amazing food that gets the tastebuds dancing around like kids on caffeine. I recommend this spot to anyone that's not a fan of southern food, because they'll most definitely change their tune once they give this place a chance.
Food, prices, and service were great
Very good wear ur mask thou

I have been looking for a place to get good southern soul food from since I moved from Houston. This is it! I ordered the fish, mac n cheese, and cabbage and let me tell you, the first bite, I literally said, "Oh my God" out loud. The customer service was fantastic and they were more than helpful. The price is incredibly reasonable for a large entree and two sides. Worth the travel time and every penny. I will be back next week. :-)
Not only was the food amazing but the level of care and respect for the customer is unparalleled. The owner Tony has a big heart . Best soul food in Brooklyn ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Best Soul food I've had in a very long time. You can tell its made with Love!!! Jack Daniel's ribs with Mac and cheese is my Go to meal. You can't go wrong
This place is amazing! The food was a literal taste of heaven. So fresh and delicious! Highly recommend. Customer service was impeccable as well!

Amazing, authentic, locally owned restaurant. Tony and Melody (the owners) cook up a delicious assortment of dinner options and start serving in the early afternoon. Get there early if you want Mac n cheese or collard greens! It’s home cooked soul-food at it’s finest.
Their mac and cheese!!!! 😋
Omg the food is amazing!!! And the people are so nice!

Words do no justice. Fantastic food, great people, a full on experience. No one is in line checking their phones and looking bored, they’re too busy chatting and laughing. Hope to God this place stays around!!!
Great experience plus outstanding food
Food tasted great. I dont like that you dont get the 2 piece of plantains when you order certain things. Otherwise it was ok. Appropriate prices, and cleanliness on point.
Love this place! Delicious fish and jerk chicken and wonderful staff. Thank you again!
Man... best food since being down here. So ill keep it short. I want to eat here everyday
Thanks for the good conversation and great food.
My dinner is always excellent when I order from the take to Heaven especially dessert
The food!!!!

Had to be in the area for work and found "taste of heaven", the name says everything. The chicken bbq wings are addictive,  ribs and chicken breast where the meat just slides off the bone. Dont get me started on how great the sides are (yams, rice , pasta, ect) topped off with warm cornbread that melts in your mouth and soul. Last but not least the service made me feel like I was part of the neighborhood and a friend that hasn't been any to visit in a long time. Thank you for a great meal . Now I will be  a  life long customer
Delicious southern cooking. I got the BBQ chicken, and it  was perfectly done, really moist and just melted in my mouth. Sides were really good, too.

Nice people.  First time eating here.  Good value for the dollar.  Lots of great veggie options along with meat options.  My wife liked their cheesecake.  I appreciated the fact that they don't kill all their food with salt. Only thing we really didn't like were the made to order, fresh cut French fries.  They were so greasy, not crispy at all and absolutely no salt.  Tried most of their meats.  Turkey leg good.  Ribs good.  Jerk chicken very good.  My wife didn't like the greens.  Some thought the Mac and cheese was a bit too peppery.  Cabbage was fabulous!  Mixed veggies okay.  Green beans good.  Would definitely eat here again if in the area and in the mood for some good home cooking.
Really great food honestly
The food was really good! I would definitely go again
Amazing food, great people.
It makes you feel like you were in your mother's kitchen feels Just Like Home Cooking it tastes delicious good
Food is amazing,  very friendly

I love this restaurant!..the food is amazing!!!!!!!! the name is perfect just like the food if heaven taste like this take me now 😩🤷🏻‍♀️ The staff is great ,super friendly and make you feel welcome  you won’t regret coming at all come once I promise you your gonna wanna come again
Great soul food

Taste of Heaven is the real deal! The customer service is A1 and the food hit the spot! All the way from Chicago we took a chance and it was well worth it! Lovely family restaurant that makes you feel right at home.
Great food. Not all options were avalible. Very friendly staff!
Great food! Great energy! Jerk ribs are amazing! Can’t wait to try the rest of the menu.
Best food around. Been there many times and would highly recommend.

I’ve been to taste of heaven a total of 3x so far. All three times I’ve been to the restaurant they’ve kept the same energy. The staff gives a warm welcome and greets you when you first come in. They go over the food they have with you and ask if you need a minute to decide. I originally found taste of heaven by searching for caterer for my baby shower. The 1st time I walked into the restaurant I was greeted by the smell of food that made my mouth water. The food was so good I decided that day we will be using them for our shower after all. Fast forward a few weeks later I came to pick up the food for the shower and everything was nicely packed, they helped me load my vehicle with the food as well. When I arrived they were just finishing my order which was great to know the food was cooked fresh. Everyone at the shower enjoyed the food and ate so much I only was able to get 1 plate sadly lol but I had a idea that would happen. I will definitely be back to taste of heaven in the future and will try to make monthly trips not only because of the food but the staff. They give you a warm welcome and y’all to you as if you’re family. If that’s not soulful then I don’t know what is. Thanks again!!!
One of Brooklyn’s Food Gem 💎

Ms. Melody and The Taste of Heaven staff THANK YOU! My son chose Taste of Heaven to cater his baby shower and it was AMAZING! Upon arrival Melody and her staff made us feel like family. They sat us to a table and bought us food to eat while we waited. The collard greens, Mack and cheese, Rice and Peas, fried, BBQ and baked Chicken, BBQ Rib's etc.... Finger licking good. I’ve told all my coworkers this restaurant is a must! Thank you again!
Food was delicious and the portions were hefty. I had mac & cheese, yams, rice, and jerk chicken. If ever you're close by do not hesitate to stop by...you won't regret it!

I goggled this restaurant and boy did I enjoy it. The food was delicious! I met Heavenly she was very welcoming she was the youngest of her siblings so the restaurant is named after her. She waited on me and gave me plenty of food. If you say you were still hungry. Then we no you are lying. I got 2 slices of cakes for 5.00. I'm from Atlanta Ga. I will definitely be back.
Delicious. Even something like boiled string beans has layers of flavor and spice. Wonder if they’d do a whole holiday turkey
Very friendly staff. Food is delicious. Feels like home. Would Definitely recommend to anyone looking to enjoy good food on a great atmosphere.👍👍
Liked It! Food was good, Seasoning just right and excellent prices
There food is delicious
They can try to give a lot more food. Chinese resturants not cheap. Thats why places like this don't stay open long, cause of the little bit of food they serve
Delicious. I enjoyed every bite of everything I ordered.  Ribs, mac and cheese, potato salad, string beans with potatoes. Highly recommended.
The food is absolutely delicious 😋 and the staff is very friendly as well !!!!!!! Jack Daniels Turkey legs and Chicken are wonderful!
The Best Food Ever I Can Eat They Food All Day No Matter What It Is 😩😍 And Their Yams Is To Die For 🤞🏾
Delicious and all about community
Good was delicious and staff was super nice.
Food is delicious everything is delicious
The best soul food I had in a long time
Ridiculous....
its ok
Food was great, the Jerk Turkey wings was 🔥🔥
Wish I would have had the chance to try them. Their pictures of their food looks amazing. Unfortunately I went there during the listed business hours only to find them closed. Next time I guess.
Love the food employees are very nice
(Translated by Google) This place has a rich Samson  (Original) Este lugar tiene un rico Sansón
Spectacular - this spot is the real deal

This place needs a whole 6 out of 5 stars. Everyone that works there is so nice. The food is to die for and the prices are so reasonable. They are not cheap with the food at all. I highly recommend you to eat at this spot. I can’t wait to visit again.
Nice food, and really nice folks who run the place.
(Translated by Google) Excellent service!!  (Original) Excelente servicio!!

They should have done sixth star to rate just for this place! Don't know the words to describe how good the food, atmosphere and whole feeling of this place is. You just have to try! Incredible! I'm comming almost each year to BK/NYC and I really love good food. But this place and the food served here is not good, it's more than that, more than anything you can say/write and I just love it. Top place to eat for me. Love the atmosphere and love hazelnut coffee also ;) Thank you!
A true gem in Brooklyn
I love it here. Never wanna leave.
I've never been a fan of collard greens until now. That BBQ chicken & mac & cheese... Mmmm good. I would definitely  recommend this spot to friends and family.
My husband and I had the Jack Daniel's chicken and ribs and it was amazing. The meat was just falling off the rib bones, the side dishes are awesome as well.

From the beginning until the end my experience in this spot was incredible. •The food exceeded my expectations. •This is literally what you call comfort food ! •The owners were just as great •It’s a great family business .  MUST GO!
Would rate 6 star. Incredible food, lovely proprietors

The best southern food.  The food always test good every time. People come from near and far for the food here.  Every nationality eat here.  That is how good the food is.  The owners of the restaurant are very friendly and nice.
Great jerk chicken
Love how attentive  They are as well as great food... A true diamond in the rough....

Some good ole soul food right here. The staff was very charismatic and personable. You can really tell that they try to connect and get to know there customers, everyone I saw that came in always received the warmest welcome from the staff like they’ve known each other for years (maybe they did). The fried chicken and fresh cut French fries (probably best fries I ever had lol) were amazing. This will definitely be a go to spot of mine whenever in Brooklyn and in need of eats.
This has the best food in the area.
Amazing service even better food
The food and service is excellent would definitely recommend it if you're into soul food

Came to NYC from NC for my girls 30th birthday. She's been wanting to try this place so we finally made it over today and it was one of the best decisions! The food is amazing and the people and atmosphere are real authentic. Very neighborhood feeling with good home cook food! Highly recommend, and im picky af lol
I love this spot! The food is great, the cake was delicious, the service is great, the people are awesome. I highly recommend it.
Tasty BBQ in a small spot with a few seats.  The Jack Daniels ribs are delicious.
The food is SIMPLY Amazing. Its not a fancy Restaurant but the Absolute BEST Soul Food that I have EVER had.
Great homestyle soul food. Lovely staff!
Amazing food, great family business. Highly recommend!
Great service they didn't have one part of order ready and they offered to get for free later

The food here is so good! I had ox tail last time and it was amazing! The owners of this little gem are honest and man the controls both upfront and in the kitchen. Whenever I'm driving through this area I make it a point of being HUNGRY and they haven't disappointed me yet! Thank you guys!
Delicious
Food is awesome.
Amazing, from the super friendly chef and staff to it's food with portions that have you feeling like a post Thanksgiving dinner! Neighborhood gem.

The ambiance isn't the primary focus however the food is. This Black owned restaurant makes dinning out feel good. Every item has its own distinctive taste making eating much more enjoyable. The prices are reasonable and the customer service is superb. Please arrive or call early because the food goes fast. It's totally work it.

My brother and I happened upon this gem today while on a day trip from Philly.  We enjoyed the fried fish, collards and baked mac & cheese.   We also added a couple of pieces of jerked chicken and a sample of the jerked ribs. The food was exceptional, and the staff is very friendly and welcoming.  I didn’t expect the portions to be so large and I didn’t leave room for the dessert; that’s made on location.  I ended up ordering some turkey wings, sides and dessert to go.  They even have several flavors of Kool-Aid, talk about classic soul food.  You won’t regret visiting the Taste of Heaven.
Excellent. Food is spot on. Decent price's
username: spicy mia tv spicy mia tv

caption: Enjoyed everything Mac and cheese was outstanding also the favor an ingredient was right on point I will definitely recommend this restaurant.

This place is amazing, I come here whenever I'm craving soul food — never disappoints. The owner Tony is a great guy as well, he keeps the prices low for the local neighborhood though the quality of the food and quantity he serves is worth much more. Definitely recommend.
Good food
Real Soul food served the way it should be served~with a 😊.  The staff is wonderful and the food was great.  It was a spontaneous find and it was worth it.   I highly recommend.

This place is simply perfect.  Large Portions ✅ Delicious Food ✅ Reasonable Price ✅ Hygiene ✅ Outstanding Service ✅  I came in with a few large Amazon boxes and they even offered to help me bring them back to my apartment.  You guys rock!

I got the Jerk ribs & Jerk chicken.  The Jerk ribs was so tender they were gonna fall off the bone which was great.   Unfortunately there was only 2 lousy piece of ribs.  No room for sharing or getting full from it.  I guess the large quantity of rice with no sauce was supposed to fill me up.  The jerk chicken was decent but nothing to go crazy about.  The Strawberry cake was great and loved it had real strawberries.  It didn't create the memory I thought I'd have in my mind.

OMG!!!! Where do I begin??? Let me first start off by saying that it was my first time eating here and the food was absolutely breathtaking!!!! Not only that, I tasted every bit of season and spice mixed with bursting flavors in their dishes!!!! It was by far the best soul food that I’ve ever experienced!!! Shhhh don’t y’all my Mom! Lol  In addition to the food, their customer service was impeccable! We actually used this restaurant for  their catering and the customer service from the owners was by far the most amazing experience!!!!! Melody, Tony, and Tyrone are incredible!!!!!  Make sure you guys eat here, trust me!!!!!
I stumbled upon this spot, told the server and she gave me details of every dish and everything i ordered was great I'd definitely go back
Excellent.

It's the classics, so perfectly prepared. Our office often orders lunch from this spot, and it's always great.  This is a fun place to show up in-person and explore what's on the steam table. It changes day-by-day, and there are always new things showing up!  No frills, nothing fancy for decor. They put all the energy into the food!
Feel’s like Freddy’s BBQ from House of Cards where you may see Cuomo or De Blaiso walking out the side door. East Williamsburg’s hidden BBQ gem.

The best food in williamsburg ! A true hidden gem, awesome food, awesome staff ! Cornbread, mac and cheese, bbq wings, jack daniels ribs are my favorite ! Wash it down with a huge kool-aid ! I really wish they'd replace sweet chick !
The food is very good. Large servings and reasonable pricing.  The owners are very nice and welcoming. You can tell it’s a favorite of the locals in the neighborhood. You won’t be disappointed.
On point the best soul food around.
The food was really good as was the service! Definitely a must do for soul food!
Loved it...
Great place and delicious food. The employees very kind. One of the places where you want to come back and back again.

The place is nice and clean the workers are  respectful and helpful  and professional I ordered turkey wings macaroni and cheese and  cabbage the food was delicious I will definitely be going back there and I will tell all my friends about it 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾
Great food and Great customer service highly recommend

Everything tastes good...wish they gave larger pieces of corn bread...they put lots of food on your plate and give you a small piece of corn bread... the food is great especially the collard greens but a small piece of corn bread😊
The food is AMAZING!! I'm from SC and I homestly give them the seal of approval! The ribs were tender, rice perfect, mac and cheese was sooo good!!
I love the soul food. great customer service
Great food and the hospitality was second to none
Food is excellent seasoned well love this place I have to go offten.
Good food straight from heaven, and remember, when GOD created the Heaven's and the earth,  He  saw that it was good.
Great food and even better customer service. Inexpensive and best soul food in the neighborhood. My favorite in Brooklyn... Did I mention the customer service... Makes you feel at home.
Nice, friendly staff. Good food. Cheap prices. Solid cornbread.
Great place, cheap prices, and nice people!
Delicious and affordable soul food--but get there early before various things run out!
Just tried this for the first time a few moments ago and man oh man. It was amazing. Definitely recommend it. Staff was welcoming and the food was genuine soul food.
My favorite Dish is the Jack Daniel Ribs, Mac &Cheese and Collard Greens/cabbage . Ohhh and I can't forget about the Kool-Aid (reminds me of my childhood) !  Job well done Sweets and Boss Lady! 😉
Amazing food! Don't miss!!
Best food in the area.
Oh. my. God. So Good. The meat is amazing! Go early because they run out. Everything is juicy and tender. Could not recommend more.
I eat here all the time when I’m feeling too lazy to cook. The staff is AMAZING.
The food here is delicious! Best soul food we had in New York. The owner is really friendly and the atmosphere is relaxed. It felt like a breath after the constant buzz of the city.
The food  is delicious!!!  The staff is courteous  and very professional.  I simply love the food and highly recommend it.
Awesomeness
Excellent food made by excellent people.
The food is delicious never disappointed comfortable and friendly atmosphere

We stumbled upon this place when we were craving some delicious soul food. And "Taste of Heaven" is the perfect name for what we walked into. To start, the owners were incredibly freindly and hospitable. They showed us every menu item they had to serve. I enjoyed the juicest, fall off the bone bbq chicken and some of the best mac n cheese I've ever had. The rice and beans were delicious too. My girlfriend had the freshest fried chicken that I've ever eaten. This was what I hope Heaven tastes like. And to top it off, we had the sweetest banana pudding cake. I can't wait to go back some day.
Great tasty food and friendly staff!!!! Can’t wait to repeat! Love from Barcelona!
Good soul food
The Potato Salad id off the hook.
Amazing!!! Love this place sooo much!!
We caught then at the end of the night so the menu was limited, but what we did get was top notch. Jerk chicken, cabbage, rice and beans all excellent
Amazing food friendly staff in a clean environment definitely the best soul food I've ever tasted. Better than Amy Ruth
Anytime of the day it’s great food

Five stars?  Absolutely!!!  Do yourself a favor and make a trip to this amazing little gem.  I had the best, most deliciously amazing Jerk Chicken.  It was tender, moist and full of flavor.  The Red Beans and Rice were delicious too!  My son had the Curry Chicken and a side of Greens - We were arguing over who's was better because we both loved our meals so much.  And... it doesn't stop at the food... the people are extremely kind, friendly and accomodating.  This place is an absolute home run.  If you are a fan of the southern style "meat and two (or three) sides" this is definitely the place for you!

We're from Texas and the food here taste sooo good. It's real soul food, southern cooking. Very delicious! They're reasonably priced and served large portions. The company was even great! I would definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone!

We had dinner here before a show at Brooklyn Steel. It was amazing. Everything I tried (and I tried everything) was wonderful. Great, friendly staff. Excellent food. I'm looking forward to coming back.
Food bursting with flavor and excellent service. The best soul food in New York City. Do yourself a favor and check this place out.
Excellent food, Friendly staff, Great Banter.  If you like home cooked soul food, go here.
Excellent food, casual atmosphere and really nice staff
I  went there for lunch enjoyed the food the sweet potatoes were a bit too sweet for me overall the food was great
The service is still is out of sight and the food is delicious
It's like coming home! Friendly place absolutely delicous food,loved the hostess ms. Jill.will bring my mother inlaw, she'll love it.

Great SOUL food. Open for breakfast lunch and dinner this mellow family run shop offers all you can desire in a home cooked meal. Their homemade desserts and variety of Kool-aid drinks gives this place a touch of home.

My meal was delicious. On top of that the owners were awesome as well.  The dessert was wonderful. Encourage all to come out and support this establishment.  Keep up the great work.. thanks for everything.💯
The best soulfood in Williamsburg brooklyn...

They Have Breakfast Now....I Love Their Fish With Collard Greens, Baked Macaroni & Cheese, Yams, Cornbread With Potato Salad... Their Jerk Chicken Is Great With Cabbage, Rice (My Favorite Dish).... I Still Will Order Other Dishes Even If My Favorites Are Not Unavailable... The Baked Chicken Is Great And The BBQ Beef Short Ribs Are Amazing....
I just had turkey wings, yams and collard greens....excellent. large portions. Not Salty. great service.I shall return........Hungry for More
Great food.i had the baked chicken,collard greens and string beans.
Omg this food is life first time there today everything tastes good customer service is awesome a homey place.  My new favorite place work just became good again.
Highly recommended this place
Best soul food spot in brooklyn!!!!!!!!!
Large Portions Of Great Tasting Food.
Turkey wings mac and cheese  collard greens!  Yummy  great staff
Great food and service

The food is yummmmmmy.  My favorites are the Mac & Cheese, Candied Yams, Collard Greens and Potato Salad. The team is courteous and friendly. It is worth the trip anytime you want authentic soul food, prepared from the heart.  Will definitely be coming back again and again.
Tasty joint!
We had a work luncheon and ordered our food from taste of heaven. Oh boy the food was amazingly delicious. I had fried chicken, Mac & cheese and candied yams.
Fantastic food. Great experience. I will eat here all the time. Service was wonderful as well. I highly recommend this place.
Food was amazing!  Everyone in there was friendly. They were about to close but they let us enjoy our food. You could see the smiles on their faces as we ate. I'm going back today!
Great tasting food, big portions, welcoming staff A1 ✔
